    • Uses of EntityConfiguration in com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry

      Subinterfaces of EntityConfiguration in com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MutableEntityConfiguration<T>
      Manageable version of a EntityConfiguration, implementations must allow the configuration to be modified through this interface, without changing the core properties like getEntityType() and getName().
      Classes in com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry that implement EntityConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EntityConfigurationImpl<T>
      The base configuration for an Entity type.
